text: Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā visibbanāpekkhā jotiṃ samādaheyya vā samādahāpeyya vā aññatra tathārūpappaccayā pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā visibbanāpekkhā jotiṃ samādaheyya vā samādahāpeyya vā aññatra tathārūpappaccayā pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 137. Should any bhikkhunī who is not ill, seeking to warm herself, kindle a fire or have one kindled — unless there is a suitable reason — it is to be confessed.
